mansionBandit.gameWorld.main
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  mansionBandit.gameWorld.main.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
Host, Slave
public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object

Player object is different for each client in the game Each client has its own player and this class also takes the pre defined rooms layout

Author:
Liam De Grey
